name: @dopt/users-javascript-client
description: A generated JavaScript API client for Dopt's users API

scripts.dev: echo "@dopt/users-javascript-client does not require dev"; exit 0;
scripts.format: echo "@dopt/users-javascript-client does not require formatting"; exit 0;
scripts.formatcheck: echo "@dopt/users-javascript-client does not require formatcheck"; exit 0;
scripts.lint: echo "@dopt/users-javascript-client does not require lint"; exit 0;
scripts.test: echo "@dopt/users-javascript-client does not require test"; exit 0;
scripts.typecheck: echo "@dopt/users-javascript-client does not require typecheck"; exit 0;
scripts.prepublishOnly: NODE_ENV=production pnpm -w exec turbo run build --filter="@dopt/users-javascript-client"
